title: My CV
text:
Individual Post-Doctoral Position, sDiv Synthesis Center, German Center for intergrative Biodiversity Research (iDiv) Halle-Jena-Leipzig. Project title: “Unraveling the relationship between genetic diversity, the latitudinal gradient in biodiversity, and life-history strategies”. Supervision: Chloé Schmidt, Michael Gerth, Jonathan Chase.





Career Break & Maternity





Doctoral Student, Molecular Genetic Lab (led by Linda Vigilant) and Gorilla Behavioral Ecology Group (led by Martha Robbins), Department of Primatology, Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology. “Genetic population monitoring of African great apes”.





Volunteer field research assistant (Gabon). MPI-EVA. Led by Prof. Dr. Christophe Boesch and Dr. Martha Robbins





Research Assistant, Molecular Genetic Lab (led by Linda Vigilant)

title: My CV
text:
2015 – 2016:
Seven months PhD field research, Virunga Massif, Rwanda, DRC and Uganda. Sample collection, training of field assistants, team supervision, management of sampling supplies and samples for the Virunga Massif gorilla census.

title: My CV
section: 2018: Teaching Assistant at University of Leipzig: ‘Genetik I für Informatiker’ led by Dr. Bert Klagges, and ‘Statistik’ led by Dr. Brigitte Schlögl.
text: 2018: Teaching Assistant at University of Leipzig: ‘Genetik I für Informatiker’ led by Dr. Bert Klagges, and ‘Statistik’ led by Dr. Brigitte Schlögl.

title: My CV
text:
2013-2014:
Twelve months field assistant, Pan African Programme: the cultured chimpanzee (PanAf), Loango National Park, Gabon. Field site manager, organization and collection of ecological data and organic materials on chimpanzee behaviour and habitat. Habituation of wild chimpanzees and gorillas.

title: My CV
text:
2011:
Three months volunteer team leader. Bird nest monitoring of great tits (Parus major). Center for Evolutionary and Functional Ecology (CEFE), Montpellier. Team coordination and weekly monitoring of nest status, egg count and chick development for one field site.

title: My CV
text:
2024-today:
Various articles for the Gorilla Journal (non-scientific, English to French, French to English).

title: My CV
text:
2023:
Complete translation of the BonDiv protocol (150p. English to French).

title: My CV
text:
2015-2019:
Various proposals and reports (English and German to French) for the MPI-EVA.

title: My CV
text:
2012-2013:
Selected chapters of the PanAf field protocol (English to French).
